Thanks alot for the feedback St.Ack,

I thought that "TODO: unimplemented" =
was the only part of the content
being dumped successfully (as this line is=
 the 4th line of the WARC
file). I wouldn't have thought that it ment readi=
ng that uncompressed
file is unimplemented so far...
About voting for this =
issue - as the reporter of the issue I'm unable
to vote for it.
Why I want =
to read uncompressed WARCs? I'd presume that
compressing/uncompressing thes=
e WARCRecords isn't a trivial task - it
costs extra memory and CPU cycles. =
Memory/CPU I'd prefer to use for
other tasks...

Regards
  Olaf Freyer
